definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Beads shall be fitted at the factory and delivered attached to frames.
sentences.chinese: 珠子应当在工厂安装，装上框子后发运。

sentences.english: for our clients need the items urgently. we hope that you deliver it asap.
sentences.chinese: 由于我方客户急需此货，希望你方尽早发运。

sentences.english: Those containers receive an inspection by local customs officials before departure.
sentences.chinese: 这些集装箱在发运之前接受当地海关官员的检查。

sentences.english: “The arrangements for that shipment will require detailed advance planning, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “安排那批货物的发运事先需要详细的计划，”他说。

sentences.english: To make it easier for us to get the goods ready for shipment, we hope that partial shipment is allowed.
sentences.chinese: 为了便于我方备货装船，希望允许分批发运。

sentences.english: Please send us the following items C. O. D.
sentences.chinese: 请按货到付款条件发运下列商品。

sentences.english: She was busy with checking in luggage and buying tickets for us.
sentences.chinese: 她忙前忙后地帮我们发运行李，买好了车票。

sentences.english: The short-shipped goods will be forwarded together with your next order.
sentences.chinese: 短装的货物将与你方下一批订货一道发运。

sentences.english: How do you love the bads dispatched, by railway or by sea?
sentences.chinese: 你方将怎么样发运货物，铁路还得海运？

sentences.english: Review in detail the FPSC variable data.
sentences.chinese: 详细检查首次发运鉴定的计量型数据。

sentences.english: A firm in Naples has sent us a truck-load of prunes.
sentences.chinese: 那不勒斯一家公司发运给我们一卡车梅干。

definition: to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to order goods/to place an order
to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
